answers.author: Mark Wawner
answers.text:
The City of Va. Beach has a 20,000 capacity amphitheater(7,500 fixed covered seats, 12,500 lawn seats) opened in 1996. Hosts approx. 25 shows a year, average attendance of 12,000 and returns on average 1.2 million to the City each year.  Built under a Public Private Development, fourty year lease with LiveNation, original construction costs of 17.75 million, 10.75 mil Public, and 7 million Private.  Private partner is responsible for all booking, and normal maintenance, Capital maintenance is split 53.5 public, 46.5 private. Site is City owned 94 acres, closest residential is 2,200 ft, behind Amphitheater.  I can provide additional information if needed.  I can be reached at 757-385-6460.
